website_summaries.verdict: Eggs, mayo, and sauces won't stand a chance against the whisk that comes with this three-cup, two-speed food chopper.
pros: Drizzle hole lets you add liquids without removing lid
cons: Chops food at the bottom of the bowl more finely than at the top

customer_reviews.title: you get what you pay for and Ilike the Oster products
customer_reviews.text: the 3 cup size is what I was looking for and Oster delivered. easy to operate and rinse out. the blade is very sharp so be extremely careful when using the chopper
customer_reviews.author: melodie froelich

customer_reviews.title: This is the best little chopper ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best little chopper ever. I had a problem at first with the motor not working, but either the manufacturer or the provider replaced the entire unit immediately. It chops almost everything (not sticky things) beautifully and quickly. It handles enough for most of my recipes, and is easily cleaned either by hand or in the dishwasher (without the base unit, of course). I just love it and use it at least once a week.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customert

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size bowl for my useage
customer_reviews.text: The 3-cup bowl is big enough to hold what I wish to chop or blend, and not seep out while it is working. Would like the blade to sit closer to the bottom. I think I could get a smoother blending of liquid and fruit. I didn't realize it comes with a whisk. Can't wait to try to whip cream or egg whites using the alternate blade. Great little machine for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Minnie Me

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Chops perfectly. Easy cleanup. This is my second purchase, loved it so much I bought it for a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My wife make mi order the Oster FPSTMC3321 because she use it before and I founded in Amazon at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Blasco

customer_reviews.text: Only used it once, then kaput. It no longer works. Not sure what happened
customer_reviews.author: Geralyn Pierce

customer_reviews.title: I love this chopper.
customer_reviews.text: This gets bad reviews.. But I love it. When it fails, I get another one. For the cost, it does what it needs to do for me! I love it as a single person.
customer_reviews.author: Nutragirl

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Received new and in good working condition works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Get a different one.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with the hopes of using it to make hummus. I was extremely excited to use it, but it never worked properly. After 2-3 sustained pulses, the blades would no longer spin regardless of whether one used the slow or fast pulse. One would have to take apart all the components and put them back again before this food processor would work again. However, it would only work for at most 3 pulses. I returned it ASAP!
customer_reviews.author: Abdulkareem Agunbiade

customer_reviews.title: Oster Mini Chopper
customer_reviews.text: Only reason I gave this four stars is that it is very hard to get into place for it to work, you have to have the container just right for the power to work Otherwise it is very handy.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: I love this chopper
customer_reviews.text: I had this before and I dropped the container and it cracked. I found the container cost more to replace than just reordering a new one and I use this a lot
customer_reviews.author: Marlene E Lieber

customer_reviews.title: Not Great
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't work well. It wouldn't even chop an apple. Even though it has a 3 cup capacity, you need to put very small batches in it for it to work at all. I miss my Sunbeam.
customer_reviews.author: S. K. Frymyer

customer_reviews.title: I love this little machine
customer_reviews.text: I really love this little machine that does easy cutting. I use it to make salsa and cut my veggies up. Never had a problem with it.
customer_reviews.author: gina4ever

customer_reviews.title: Worst processor I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Worst processor I have ever owned! No power. If you add too much liquid it leaks out the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki D.

customer_reviews.title: Worst appliance I ever bought.
customer_reviews.text: Will chop parsley, buy nothing of substance like carrots. Seems to have very little power, and I wish I had returned it immediately. as it is it is in the "give away" basket.
customer_reviews.author: Atlantic Aviator

customer_reviews.title: I just used once, but seems I'll have problems ...
customer_reviews.text: I just used once , but seems I'll have problems soon . The touch bottom , sometimes , don't run the motor .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: cheap but good
customer_reviews.text: Although this is a relatively "cheap" food processor, it is perfect for salsa, and things that you don't want to pull out the big processor for.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: nice. loved it.
customer_reviews.text: a very good piesce. earlier had black-decker ergo 650, but constant whipping of liquid, spoiled the motor. this one looks good as i dont see any chance of liquid spilling out or affecting the motor. plus u get a spatula, and whipping blade too besides the chopping blade. a good item all over.
customer_reviews.author: madhu

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long, no support from Oster website
customer_reviews.text: I have used this 3 times since I bought it. I specifically wanted the whisk feature to make my own mayo. But now it won't work unless I hold the lid tight into the opening, otherwise the safety feature won't let the chopper work. Of course, safety features are good, but if I have to use one hand to both hold the cup tight and push the button in order to pour oil in with the other hand the whisk feature is useless, it makes my hand hurt. And the Oster website has no support or replacement parts whatsoever for this product. Useless!! Waste of $20. Worked great the one time it worked without manipulation.
customer_reviews.author: K.A.

customer_reviews.title: Don't Bother
customer_reviews.text: If "blending" already blended food (like baby food); this works. For anything else, my knife chops more thoroughly and with much less noise!
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: I use this appliance twice as often as any other
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, and very reasonably priced. I bought one for all three of my daughters as well. It has a large enough capacity to handle chopping for any meal for four. It washes easily in the dishwasher. It doesn't take much space on the counter. It is quiet. It comes with this handy "blade" that makes whipped cream in seconds. I have arthritis in my hands, so dicing and mincing occasionally hurt. I just cut my veggies into one inch cubes and I can have chopped or minced in seconds. I highly recommend this chopper.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Redhead

customer_reviews.title: YUM!
customer_reviews.text: Works well and does the job for me perfectly. Quick little device for a quick little job that I need done.
customer_reviews.author: Hill

customer_reviews.title: Speed control
customer_reviews.text: The high speed function is not working. It worked the first day, and then it stopped. Oster products are usually better then this.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Harris

customer_reviews.title: MINI CHOPPER
customer_reviews.text: IT IS GREAT WORK GOOD CHOPS WONDERFUL AND CLEANS REAL EASY I AM GLAD I ORDERED THIS. SAVE TIME BOY
customer_reviews.author: LORRAINE

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect and comes in handy for just about anything.
customer_reviews.author: mwamazin

customer_reviews.title: Mini Chopper
customer_reviews.text: This Mini Chopper was delivered quick and works great. The opening in the lid is a great idea for adding liquid or seasonings to already chopped things. Love the black color as it matches all my appliances.
customer_reviews.author: Country Gal

customer_reviews.title: Oster Mini Chopper evaluation
customer_reviews.text: I suppose that this design is wrong because the knives' stem is too short to work in the 3 cup valume. In addition, the stem is smooth that do not help to move product during the treatment. Here enough space to install additional set of knives, but the motor probably is not strong enough. The product looks good but is not so great in work.
customer_reviews.author: Yak

customer_reviews.title: This chopper is the worst kitchen chopper that we have bought
customer_reviews.text: This chopper is the worst kitchen chopper that we have bought. It is not strong enought to chopp any food as onion, cockies, tomato, etc (even in very small quantities). We would like to know if it is posible to change this device.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CHOPPER
customer_reviews.text: I use this chopper for many things and it works wonderful. Can only do smaller amounts at a time but it's quick and efficient. I particularly like to use it when chopping garlic and onions. It's wonderful. Recommended by me.
customer_reviews.author: L. Driscoll

customer_reviews.title: last item I will ever buy
customer_reviews.text: it does not work at all. suppose to be new in original package. when I plugged it in nothing!!! I am so upset & disappointed, I will not buy anything again.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Simply put, this unit does what I expected it to do, since this was a replacement unit for an identical one which I used for about ten years. Good for small jobs, easy to clean, and easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: len

customer_reviews.title: Oster Mini Chopper
customer_reviews.text: I really like it, and like the fact that it is a larger capacity cup. Also like the small scraper and whisk feature.
customer_reviews.author: Vera Stewart

customer_reviews.title: IT IS SMALL BUT...
customer_reviews.text: as my sister used to say "good things come in small packages". The delivery was fast and the product works great for chopping up small quantities of vegtables etc...

customer_reviews.title: Mini Chopper
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size for small jobs. I like the whipping attachment for liquid items. A very good appliance for a beginner cook.

customer_reviews.title: the Hi button did not work.  Very noisy.  Returning product.
customer_reviews.text: Bad product. Hi button did not work (only has hi and low). Very nosiy. Returning product. Have been busy with Christmas otherwise would have returned it the next day I got it.

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: If you need a neat compact copper this is for you and its easy to clean. this copper doesn't take up to much counter space.

customer_reviews.title: great little chopper
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter and she absolutely loves it. She is so pleased with the speed and precision of this little chopper. I would recommend it when you don't want to take the trouble to get out the large food processor.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda D. Alley

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses this for everything. This was a second one since we use the first one so much. Works well, he uses it a lot to make chutney. Easy to use, quick to clean. Blades stay sharp for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: RamFam

customer_reviews.title: Two died on the same day of use
customer_reviews.text: Just like other reviews, worked for 15 seconds and died. This is my second one that died on the same day of arrival. Sparks from the unit and was only chopping warm peas.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle H.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: have a little trouble with it at times but on the whole works well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, but plastic is very thin. Doesn't seem like it will last long.
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one. If ever need be I'll buy a third. I mainly use it to cut up onions. Quick and easy. On the first one I broke the container after using it for so many years. I tried looking for a replacement container but, couldn't find one. So I ended up buying a the entire set again.
customer_reviews.author: DJL

customer_reviews.title: This little gadget is so awesome! Especially if you aren't that great at chopping ...
customer_reviews.text: This little gadget is so awesome! Especially if you aren't that great at chopping uniform pieces of veggies! I have made salsa, hummus, chopped onions, celery, and garlic with ease. I even got an additional one as a gift for a friend who was getting married because she liked it so much when she came over to cook with me one day. I haven't tried the little whisk attachment yet, but I'm sure it would work great. Easy to clean and store, and beats having to clean a large food processor.
customer_reviews.author: vhall

customer_reviews.title: OK, but slow speed doesn't work on this or it's predessor.
customer_reviews.text: This has become our appliance of choice for chopping onions, peppers, nuts, making bread crumbs etc. I dropped the mixing container on our old one and it broke. For $20, and free shipping with Amazon prime, I decided to just buy a new one. This one, like the previous one, doesn't work on the low speed setting. However, since it's a pulse start button, meaning it only runs while you are pressing the button, this doesn't seem to be a problem for us.
customer_reviews.author: Furnone

customer_reviews.title: Oster mini chopper
customer_reviews.text: This mini chopper worked adequately but tends to leave big chunks unchopped. I have a very old Oster mini-chopper that is excellent but old and I wanted a replacement when it finally gives out. The old design works better I think because of the shape of the bowl. Otherwise, the push buttons are probably better that the "twist to start" mechanism on the old model. Why change the things that work well?
customer_reviews.author: melanie britton

customer_reviews.title: Works great for what I need it for
customer_reviews.text: Works great for what I need it for. I make smoothies (berries/banannas - not veggies) and it is the perfect size. I also make pesto and guacamole.
customer_reviews.author: imafoxhunter

customer_reviews.title: Not really working for me
customer_reviews.text: I ha ve a 1 cup mini chopper but had to empty it out and reload to finish a 2+ cup job. I thought a 3 cup would do the job in one chopping session. But I find that the cabbage or onion on the top doesn't get down to the blade; thus the onion or cabbage on the bottom gets chopped into mush while the veggie on the top stays at the top. So I guess I'm back to running the 1 cup chopper twice.
customer_reviews.author: R  VARNER

customer_reviews.title: decent
customer_reviews.text: It arrived quick and easy. I know it's small and you have to be delicate with it but the container cracked pretty early on after getting it. The wisk feature is really cool.. I like that a lot. Blades are EXTREMELY sharp so use great caution when cleaning. Oster makes good motors so I have a feeling it will stay in my kitchen for quite some time (occasionally buying a new cup for it)

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars

customer_reviews.title: Beware if you buy this.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't chop it pulverizes.........if I wanted a Ninja I would have ordered one. My hands are still smarting and the blood has stopped oozing since I attempted to chop an onion. If I could I'd get back my Sunbeam Oskar which served admirably for fifteen years or more. Buy it with trepidation.
customer_reviews.author: Randolph Weese

customer_reviews.title: great seller, just not a great product
customer_reviews.text: Does not work very well. Fast quick delivery, great seller, just not a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Tamera Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Loved it so much I bought 3 sets, two as gifts. :) Thanks Peggy E
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Great maxi-mini chopper!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new Oster Mini food chopper! The reason for a 4 star rating: Use caution if blending liquids as they tend to foam up and flow out under the blade/whisk and into the motor housing. This happened to me. After letting it dry out for a few days, it's working fine. And the hot chocolate was delicious, although I will use a larger blender next time! So be careful! This could happen with any food processor, large or small. This is a pleasure to use! Chop an onion in seconds, make bread crumbs instantly, many other uses. I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Jujubee

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Does a good job on small portions. Good price and does what I needed it for.

customer_reviews.title: kitchen helper
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little product that helps around the kitchen. It is simply to use and quick. Sure beat my kitchen aid one that I paid over $159.00 for. Great product witch I recommend.

product_meta.title: Oster FPSTMC3321 3-Cup Mini Chopper with Whisk, Black
product_meta.description: Make quick work of everyday food-prepping tasks in the kitchen with the help of this mini chopper. Equipped with a 150-watt motor, the efficient unit offers a 3-cup-capacity work bowl with a sharp S-shaped stainless-steel blade that chops, slices, dices, purees, and more. Two extra-large buttons make it easy to switch between low and high speed settings depending upon the consistency desired. Use the mini chopper for anything from chopping vegetables to layer onto a homemade pizza to pureeing garbanzo beans and garlic for a hummus spread. The Oster mini chopper's lid features a small opening that allows for safely adding water, olive oil, or other liquid while simultaneously processing for smooth results (no need to remove the lid). The unit also provides a handy whisk attachment for optimal whipping results, and a spatula that works well for scraping food off the sides of the work bowl. Housed in black with chromed accents, the mini chopper's cord tucks neatly away for compact storage, and dishwasher-safe parts make cleanup a snap.
feature_bullets: Drizzle hole on the lid for adding water, oil etc during chopping without having to remove the lid

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars184 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
